Leroy Southside

Description:

The Leroy Southside leaves campus and travels through Main Street in Johnson City & Binghamton, Beethoven Street, Leroy Street & Oak Street in Westside Binghamton, Court Street & the BC Junction in Downtown Binghamton, then Tompkins Street and Conklin Avenue in Southside Binghamton enroute back to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
N/A


Weekends:
N/A

Notes:

As of the Fall 2024 semester, the LRS will no longer operate.


Scroll below for a graphic map of this route, its schedule, and its stops with links to stop pictures and Google Maps location pins so that you can easily find your stop, and know when your bus is expected to arrive.

② Main St & Floral Av

③ Leroy & Murray Streets

④ Arrives at Binghamton University


M-T = Only operates Monday-Thursdays.

F = Only operates Fridays.

* = This stop will only be served Weekdays after 9 P.M., and all times on Weekends.
